[2] orיומ[רו following Neuman, Linguistic Variants, 67–68, 143 to express impersonal construction (Muraoka, STDJ, 200–201)
[4] כמדברappears to be written past the left margin
[5] note that v9a (ורדפה – תמצא) is neither cited nor commented upon in 4QpHosa, similarly app 514
[7] pl also in comm: פשרו: אשר | [את המו]ע֗דות יוליכו במועדי הגואים
[13] cf 4QDa (olim Db; 4Q266) 3iv1 ביום אשר [תשפוך עליהם העברה]
[14] pers (3pl) agrees with בוני החי֗ץ (pl) in comm, but may also fit אפרים (collective noun) in unquoted part of lem
[17] or pm, cf Strugnell, RQ 7.2 [26] (1970) 193; כיֿחכהp orthographic variant 7 כוחכהI, cf CDa I9 וכימגששים, 4Q128 149 כיא[זר]ח֯ (pm); p כוֿחכהI
[18] p ptc, cf Jer 429 Ps 789 (for x as ptc see Qimron, FS Licht, 266 n. 10); p phon
